trans-unit.source: Used as a parameter object in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> of the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 當做 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> 根物件之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 中的參數物件使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs> class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs>類別公開為`e`中的參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs> class contains the following properties:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs>類別包含下列屬性：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>屬性，用來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>已引發事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>屬性會取得圖表區域的名稱; 也可以設定其他圖表區域屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the scrollbar belongs to, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A>屬性，用來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>屬於物件捲軸，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>也可以設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A> property, which is used to get the scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A>屬性，用來取得使用者按下捲軸按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A> property, which determines if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control cancels default behavior of the scrollbar button after the code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event completes execution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>屬性，決定如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項取消的程式碼中之後的捲軸按鈕的預設行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>事件完成執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A> property, which represents the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A>屬性，使用者按下捲軸項目同時代表滑鼠游標的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A> property, which represents the Y-position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A>屬性，使用者按下捲軸項目同時代表滑鼠游標的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> that contains the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 包含捲軸的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" />。

trans-unit.source: The X position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠資料指標的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: The Y position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠資料指標的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: The type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按下的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs" /> class with the specified axis, X and Y positions of the mouse cursor, and type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的座標軸、滑鼠資料指標的 X 和 Y 位置，以及按下的按鈕類型，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that a scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得捲軸所屬的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 物件，表示捲軸所屬的座標軸。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to:
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來：

trans-unit.source: determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 決定軸類型 — X，X2，Y 或 Y2 — 的事件被引發時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得並設定軸屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者按下之捲軸按鈕的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType" /> enumeration value that represents the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType" /> 列舉值，表示使用者按下之捲軸按鈕的類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and can be used to determine the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並可用來判斷使用者所按的捲軸按鈕的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得捲軸所屬的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the scrollbar belongs to by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>屬性可以用來判斷所存取所屬捲軸的圖表區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來取得及設定圖表區域屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to cancel the default behavior of specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示是否要取消特定捲軸事件的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the default behavior of the event should be cancelled, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該取消這個事件的預設行為則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to cancel the default behavior on specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來取消特定的捲軸事件上的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: If you click on a scrollbar button, the default manipulation of the view will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果您按一下捲軸按鈕時，會發生預設操作的檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following list summarizes this default behavior:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單摘要說明此預設行為：

trans-unit.source: If the user clicks the Reset/Zoom button, the previous view will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者按一下 [重設/縮放] 按鈕，將會顯示前一個檢視。

trans-unit.source: If the user clicks in the scrollbar background—that is, not on the scrolling thumb, otherwise known as the tracker— large increments and/or decrements of the scrollbar will occur, with the increment and/or decrement size being determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者按一下捲軸背景中 — 也就是不能在捲動捲動方塊中，否則會以追蹤程式 — 大幅度及/或遞減的捲軸，就會發生以遞增或遞減大小由決定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To turn off these default behaviors, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A> property to `true` after providing custom logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉這些預設行為，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>屬性`true`提供自訂邏輯之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得當引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> 事件時，滑鼠資料指標的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the X mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，表示 X 滑鼠資料指標位置。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 這個位置是以像素表示，圖表影像的左上角為 0,0。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the X mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來取得 X 的滑鼠位置，以像素，當使用者按一下捲軸項目上。

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 0，0 座標表示圖表的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Y position of the mouse cursor at the time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得當引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked" /> 事件時，滑鼠資料指標的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the Y mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，表示 Y 滑鼠資料指標位置。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 這個位置是以像素表示，圖表影像的左上角為 0,0。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the Y mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來取得 Y 滑鼠位置，以像素，當使用者按一下捲軸項目上。

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 0，0 座標表示圖表的左上角。
